author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: Terasic has introduced the Atum Nios V Starter Kit, a feature-rich evaluation platform designed to accelerate development with Altera’s Nios V processor. The kit is aimed at embedded engineers, system developers, and educators looking for a practical way to explore RISC-V–based designs on the Agilex 3 FPGA platform. According to Terasic’s announcement, the kit is […]
title: Terasic Announces Starter Kit Featuring RISC-V Nios V Processor and Software Bundle
